"I believe these states have been emboldened by the Trump Administration’s systemic attacks on reproductive health care and general disrespect for women." - @RepMaloney

"Missouri has taken some of the most extreme actions to limit access to reproductive health care. Missouri is one of six states with only one remaining abortion provider. And as we will hear today, it is at risk of having no providers at all." - @RepMaloney

"Let me be clear about what these restrictions are: they are a denial of basic healthcare services that women have a right to receive—no matter where they live." - @RepMaloney at today's hearing on “Examining State Efforts to Undermine Access to Reproductive Health Care”
